entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
